data.name: Number Count Number
data.description:
The following pattern is formed by a [recurrence relation](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Recurrence_relation). That is subsequent terms are defined in terms of one or more of the previous terms. The first few terms of this sequence are given here.

***
Index : Value
-------------
    0| "1"
    1| "11"
    2| "21"
    3| "1211"
    4| "111221"
    
***
To solve this kata you need to complete the function ncn to return the corresponding value of the sequence for an integer input. You will always be passed a valid index value. The puzzle is to generalise the generator to produce terms beyond those given above.

e.g.

    ncn(3)
    => 1211
    ncn(6)
    => ?????
